item.title: #en @ 1528496256036835328
item.description: Hats off to @ChaoranChen_ for creating a powerful virus sequence API (originally for SARS-CoV-2) that can be quickly adapted to serve and analyze monkeypox sequences from @ncbi's Genbank. Fantastic software that shows what the benefits of truly open data are. https://t.co/SQnoPTD8s4

item.title: #en @ 1528466164036145152
item.description: As always, we are immensely grateful to those collecting, generating and generously sharing these #monkeypox sequences. It is due to this open data sharing that we are able to provide an open resource, with accessible genomes and metadata, for others to build upon. 3/7
